claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).

extracted_evidence.quote: One recombinant influenza vaccine, Flublok Quad rival ent (RIV4), is expected to be available during the 2022 23 influenza season. RIV4 is approved for persons aged ≥18 years. This vaccine contains recombinant HA produced in an insect cell line using genetic sequences from cell derived influenza viruses and is manufactured without the use of influenza viruses or eggs (127).
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote directly states that Flublok contains recombinant HA produced in an insect cell line, which supports the claim that it is produced using a novel platform involving recombinant HA expression in insect cells.

extracted_evidence.quote: This vaccine contains recombinant HA produced in an insect cell line using genetic sequences from cell derived influenza viruses and is manufactured without the use of influenza viruses or eggs (127).
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This sentence specifies that recombinant HA is produced in an insect cell line, confirming the use of insect cells in the production process, which is central to the claim.
